# Question 2
```{r}
x <- 1:100
y <- 0.25*exp(-0.25*x)
plot(x, y, type = "l", col = "purple")
```

# Question 3
```{r}
lambda <- 0.25
y <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
x <- -(1/lambda)*log(1-y)
plot(x, y)
```

# Question 4
```{r}
# pdf
x <- 1:1000
y <- 4*(1 - x)^3
plot(x, y)
```

```{r}
# cdf
y <- runif(1000, 0, 1)
x <- 1 - (1 - y)^(1/4)
plot(x, y)

# check for number 5:
```
